name: Oreo Pudding
ingredients: Instant Vanilla Pudding, Milk, Cream Cheese, Cool Whip, Thin Oreos
instructions: Follow instant vanilla pudding instructions. Crush oreos. Mix all ingredients. Layer like a casserole

name: Brownie Sundae
instructions: Follow brownie instructions. Place a scoop of ice cream on top

name: Oreo Milkshake
instructions: Mix multiple scoops of ice cream and a little bit of milk until creamy and thick
